title: "Artificial intelligence can predict electricity grid loads from road and rail usage data"
excerpt: "To satisfy demand and manage consumption peaks, electricity suppliers have to be able to predict grid loads. A team of scientists from Zurich University of Applied Sciences has developed an artificial intelligence system capable of accurately anticipating grid loads from road and rail traffic data."
